Package sample.controller

Class CustomerManager

java.lang.Object
sample.controller.CustomerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerManager extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class creates a scene that allows you to manage customers. You can add, update, and delete customers as needed.

    • onNewCustomer

      public void onNewCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      this method allows the user to create a new customer. if a customer is already selected it clears the selection as well as the text fields and comboboxes.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • onDeleteCustomer

      public void onDeleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      this method deletes customer data from the database. prior to deleting the customer, all appointments related to the customer need to be deleted first due to foreign key constraints. if no customer is selected, nothing is done.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -

    • onSaveCustomer

      public void onSaveCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException
      this method saves a customer to the database. if it is an existing customer it is updated. if it is a new customer it is inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • onApptMgr

      public void onApptMgr(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException
